nodes.text: The legend keeper was a position within the Ewok tribe that inhabited Bright Tree Village on the Forest Moon of Endor. Sometime before the Battle of Endor, Arbo served as the village legend keeper.

The Adventures of Teebo: A Tale of Magic and Suspense, a book written by Joe Johnston and published in 1984 by Random House, names Arbo the legend keeper of his village; The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, published in 2008, also notes this title.
